puzzle: JQLNQD LDG QLECJ GX DXC LOC HEXR CJQ FRAKBPQ XH LDU TFPJ CX SQ SQDQNXBQDC; CJQU GQLB TFCJ LBB CJFDIP LP CJQ GXIP XH IELPP LEQ GQLBC TFCJ. CJQ PLIQP GX DXC LOC HEXR LDU TFPJ CX SQ SQDQNXBQDC; CJQU GQLB TFCJ CJQ AQXABQ LP CJQ GXIP XH IELPP LEQ GQLBC TFCJ.
solution: HEAVEN AND EARTH DO NOT ACT FROM THE IMPULSE OF ANY WISH TO BE BENEVOLENT; THEY DEAL WITH ALL THINGS AS THE DOGS OF GRASS ARE DEALT WITH. THE SAGES DO NOT ACT FROM ANY WISH TO BE BENEVOLENT; THEY DEAL WITH THE PEOPLE AS THE DOGS OF GRASS ARE DEALT WITH.
